name: Player Individual
description: In this package I take picture of individual player.It can be portrait of a player or picture of him in a match or any occasion he participate.

name: Single Match
description: Need to take picture of a full match.In this package i take picture of everything. players photo, fan, pre-match presentation, post-match presentation and in game moments

name: Whole tournament
description: In this package i will be available for whole tournament. I will take picture of everything organizer wants me take related to sports.
